title: Around the World
description: A funky loop-driven classic from Daft Punk’s debut album.

title: Harder, Better, Faster, Stronger
description: Iconic robotic vocals and groovy synth rhythm.

title: Get Lucky
description: A smooth disco hit celebrating the feeling of connection and rhythm.

title: One More Time
description: A euphoric anthem blending house and pop, one of Daft Punk’s most iconic tracks.

title: Digital Love
description: A dreamy mix of electronic melodies and nostalgic emotion.

title: Robot Rock
description: Heavy guitar riffs mixed with robotic vocals – a pure electronic rock jam.

title: Lose Yourself to Dance
description: A groovy follow-up to 'Get Lucky' with funky rhythm and smooth vocals.

title: Instant Crush
description: A melancholic yet catchy synth-rock fusion with The Strokes’ frontman.

title: Veridis Quo
description: An emotional, instrumental piece from Discovery that feels timeless and cinematic.

title: Something About Us
description: A soft, romantic track that showcases Daft Punk’s emotional side.
